title: My Rp Art :)
body: 11 Rp for Annie and Tibbers? (: Btw Porocles if you're reading this you are by far my favorite mod of all time :)

replies.body:
I wanna play too! 

I went ahead and double checked your RP totals and it doesn't look like 11 RP would get you all the way to being able to buy Annie. I would feel pretty bad about giving you a one-time gift, and you not be able to buy anything with it =\ . 

I did notice you had enough IP to buy her that way though, and that would allow you to ask for an RP gift in the future when you need it. With that being said, let me know if you still want this one-time gift rp!

P.S. Porocles was a little preoccupied heheh....
oh that wasnt for annie i just wanted to draw her, i just really need a hextech chest, 11 rp more and yes i would like it so thanks p.s ur my second favorite mod
do you mean like extra RP or what? im so confused i cant tell lol
I double checked and it looks like the RP went through and you've used it already. Let me know if that wasn't you who used it!
Everything is normal... i'm so confused
What do you mean you may have missed something{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} P.S. its a him btw
